ygData.subject: Re: Re: skills and points
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually i fish while i train my spellcasting skills. And my fishing skill is 184 ;) It takes a heck of a long time to build up the skills at higher
ygData.messageBody:
--- From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>So what are they saying? That I can't be Bill Dance? I could see it
>now, "Ergo, professional fisherman." Fishing is a fairly worthless
>skill, anyway. Just a way to kill some time when you're waiting on
>the boat.

Actually i fish while i train my spellcasting skills. And my fishing
skill is 184 ;) It takes a heck of a long time to build up the skills
at higher levels. And i only build up the skills that are not used
as much. And besides, you can fish while you meditate ;).

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 36 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
